channel.title: RSPS Programmers/Coders Needed. [VPS READY]
channel.description:
This has been a long project for me and my partners for quite some time now, but up until recently we had to remove our coder due to lack or effort.
[u][b]What I am offering:[/b][/u] I will handle all hosting related manners. We will be running the server testing from our VPS. I am familiar with registering domains. I do have an allowed budget for this product, and I do have income. When the server gains popularity, we will split the profits fairly. I am not looking for a get cash quick scheme, I am genuinely looking to start a successful community. You will also all receive Admin permissions on server and forums.
I will be available to my team almost 24/7 and will distribute my mobile number to them after things have been finalized.
I am not in full time employment. I do have time to learn how to develop a server, but I am just looking for a team to handle server and client side of things.
I would like a developer who is capable of linking the forum user database with the users from the server.
If you have the skills for the job, but don't like the terms, contact me anyway. It can't hurt to talk and see if we can work something out.
Aside from experience, the only trait I'm looking for is maturity, and possibly age.
Please contact me via Skype: King.Lxa
Thanks.

item.title: RSPS Programmers/Coders Needed. [VPS READY]
item.dc:creator: @LumbysChild LumbysChild
item.description:
@LumbysChild wrote:

This has been a long project for me and my partners for quite some time now, but up until recently we had to remove our coder due to lack or effort.

What I am offering:
I will handle all hosting related manners. We will be running the server testing from our VPS.
I am familiar with registering domains.
I do have an allowed budget for this product, and I do have income.
When the server gains popularity, we will split the profits fairly. I am not looking for a get cash quick scheme, I am genuinely looking to start a successful community. You will also all receive Admin permissions on server and forums.

I will be available to my team almost 24/7 and will distribute my mobile number to them after things have been finalized.

I am not in full time employment. I do have time to learn how to develop a server, but I am just looking for a team to handle server and client side of things.

I would like a developer who is capable of linking the forum user database with the users from the server.

If you have the skills for the job, but don’t like the terms, contact me anyway. It can’t hurt to talk and see if we can work something out.

Aside from experience, the only trait I’m looking for is maturity, and possibly age.

Please contact me via Skype: King.Lxa

Thanks.
